LanguageData.VanillaFactionsExpanded.Wine.bringIngred: Bring wine must to the wine barrel to start fermentation
LanguageData.VanillaFactionsExpanded.Wine.cancelIngre: Cancel bringing wine must to the wine barrel.
LanguageData.VanillaFactionsExpanded.Wine.removeProdu: Remove wine from the wine barrel. The barrel will be ready at the present quality level ({0})
LanguageData.VanillaFactionsExpanded.Smoker.bringIngr: Bring meat to the Smoker to start smoking
LanguageData.VanillaFactionsExpanded.Smoker.cancelIng: Cancel bringing meat to the Smoker.
LanguageData.VanillaFactionsExpanded.MedievalTourname: This tournament is being hosted by {0} of {1}, and the category is {2}. There are {3} other competitors in this tournament, all eager to have a chance at winning the following prizes:\n\n{4}
LanguageData.VanillaFactionsExpanded.ParticipateIniti: You have chosen to participate in this tournament. Name your champion:
LanguageData.VanillaFactionsExpanded.TournamentWinLet: Congratulations, {PAWN_labelShort} has finished {0} out of {1} in the tournament! You have gained goodwill with {2} and won the following prizes:\n\n{3}
LanguageData.VanillaFactionsExpanded.TournamentLossLe: {PAWN_labelShort} was unfortunately not able to win the tournament this time. {PAWN_pronoun} finished {0} out of {1} place.
LanguageData.VanillaFactionsExpanded.TournamentCancel: The tournament had to be cancelled due to an incident.
LanguageData.VFEM.BlackPlagueSpreadedFurther: Black plague spreaded. {PAWN_nameDef} got infected with it. Consider quarantine for infected pawns.
